name: Awesome wordpress custom scrollbar
author: Ariful

sections.description:
custom scrollbar wordpress is a jquery custom scroller for your wordpress website .this plugin will enable awesome custom scrollbar

you can scrollbar border-style,colors,border,border-radious,speed,auto hide,width and others settings & by using options of this plugin .in this documentation,we will cover enough areas of the option panel for you to control the plugin effectively.lets begans

Plugin Live Demo link here :Awesome custom Scrollbar
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. And see your Awesome custom scrollbar

Plugin Live Demo link here :Awesome custom Scrollbar

short_description: This plugin will be enable in your any wordpress themes And see your awesome scrollbar on website
